A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson deliberately pokes Star Wars' original fanbase in the eye by creating a film with a pathetic plot\, lousy dialogue\, and even intentional omission of traditional SW signature film-making elements. Clearly\, Johnson's intent\, as stated by multiple characters\, was to burn everything down. Shame on you\, Mr. Johnson. Shame on Iger\, Kennedy\, and Disney. Shame on all of you.
